THERE IS A MRGL RISK OF SVR TSTMS TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 45 S
PNS 15 WSW TOI AUO 10 SSW LGC 15 SSW ATL 20 E ATL 15 ESE AHN 35 SE
AND 45 WNW CAE 45 NNE CAE 30 NNE FLO 45 S FAY 15 ENE CRE 15 S CRE 40
ENE CHS 15 SE CHS 30 E SAV 30 S SAV 35 NNE VLD MGR 25 WSW MGR 30 SSE
MAI 50 SW AAF.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 65 S MOB 55 WNW GZH
15 N TCL HSV 25 NNW CHA 25 E TYS 10 S AVC 80 E ECG ...CONT... 40 ENE
DAB 10 ENE OCF 50 WNW PIE ...CONT... 50 W HQM 25 NNE AST 25 ESE PDX
50 E EUG 25 N MFR 30 SSW MFR 35 SSW MHS 35 SSE MHS 35 ENE MHS 20 SE
